**Example 1: ModifyApi**



Input: 

```
tccli apigateway ModifyApi --cli-unfold-argument  \
    --ServiceId service-ody35h5e \
    --ApiId api-lqd35zzq \
    --ApiName xxx \
    --RequestConfig.Path /xxxx \
    --RequestConfig.Method get \
    --ServiceType MOCK \
    --ServiceMockReturnMessage test
```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "RequestId": "6e00553a-8158-4f70-ad43-e1b046af1502"
    }
}
```
